zh.title: 研发能力审核 R&D Capability Assessment
zh.desc: 目标：确认供应商从产品定义、设计、验证到制造导入全链路内建质量与可靠性，风险受控、供应可得、测试覆盖充分，并以数据驱动持续改进。
zh.legend.scale: 评分尺度：1 无系统｜2 非正式｜3 有文件并执行｜4 有效运行且闭环｜5 自动化数据驱动
zh.summary.title: 汇总与雷达图
zh.summary.tip: 提示：各模块得分为该模块问题的平均分（满分 5）。建议门槛：≥4.0 合格；3.0–3.9 需整改计划；<3.0 高风险。
zh.notes.placeholder: 证据/链接/记录编号（如：DFMEA#2025-03, DRR纪要, TVS选型表 等）

en.title: R&D Capability Assessment
en.desc: Goal: verify that suppliers embed quality and reliability across definition, design, verification, and manufacturing ramp, with controlled risks, secured supply, comprehensive test coverage, and data-driven continuous improvement.
en.legend.scale: Scale: 1 No system | 2 Informal | 3 Documented & executed | 4 Effective & closed-loop | 5 Automated & data-driven
en.summary.title: Summary & Radar Chart
en.summary.tip: Note: each module score is the average of its questions (max 5). Suggested thresholds: ≥4.0 Pass; 3.0–3.9 Needs remediation plan; <3.0 High risk.
en.notes.placeholder: Evidence / Links / Record IDs (e.g., DFMEA#2025-03, DRR minutes, TVS selection sheet, etc.)
